description: An MCP server designed for AI-powered marketing and social media content creation. This service provides tools, templates, and frameworks to help create engaging content across top social media platforms.

capabilities.name: find-hooks
capabilities.description: Find social media hooks by network and/or category

capabilities.name: get-network-categories-for-hooks
capabilities.description: Get all available categories for a specific social media network

capabilities.name: list-copywriting-frameworks
capabilities.description: Get a list of available copywriting frameworks and their descriptions for a specific social media network

capabilities.name: get-copywriting-framework
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific copywriting framework for a network

capabilities.name: list-archetypes
capabilities.description: Get a list of all available voice archetypes with their names and descriptions

capabilities.name: get-archetype
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific voice archetype including tweet examples

capabilities.name: flag-problematic-phrases
capabilities.description: Check text for phrases that should be avoided to make content more human and less AI-like. Returns any flagged phrases found in the text.

capabilities.name: validate-content-before-fold
capabilities.description: Check if content meets the before-fold character and line limits for each social media platform

capabilities.name: get-text-before-fold
capabilities.description: Truncate text to fit within the 'before fold' character limits for each social media platform for previewing purposes

capabilities.name: get-trending-content
capabilities.description: Fetch trending social media content from the HyperFeed API
